verses.verse: And when the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was <S%G1230>over,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the [mother] of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G4539>Salome,<s%> <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G759>spices,<s%> that they might <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G218>anoint<s%> Him.
And <S%G3029>very<s%> <S%G4404>early<s%> on the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3418>tomb<s%> when the <S%G2246>sun<s%> had <S%G393>risen.<s%>

And they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> will <S%G617>roll<s%> <S%G617>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> for us from the <S%G2374>entrance<s%> of the <S%G3419>tomb<s%>?"
And <S%G308>looking<s%> up, they <S%G2334>saw<s%> that the <S%G3037>stone<s%> had been <S%G7502>rolled<s%> <S%G7502>away,<s%> <S%G1063>although<s%> it was <S%G4970>extremely<s%> <S%G3173>large.<s%>

And <S%G1525>entering<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> they <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> at the <S%G1188>right,<s%> <S%G4016>wearing<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robe;<s%> and they were <S%G1568>amazed.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do not be <S%G1568>amazed;<s%> you are <S%G2212>looking<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G3479>Nazarene,<s%> who has been <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> He has <S%G1453>risen;<s%> He is not <S%G5602>here;<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> [here is] the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him.

"But <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> 'He is <S%G4254>going<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you into <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> you will <S%G3708>see<s%> Him, <S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G3004>said<s%> to you.'"

And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G5343>fled<s%> from the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> for <S%G5156>trembling<s%> and <S%G1611>astonishment<s%> had <S%G2192>gripped<s%> them; and they <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to <S%G3762>anyone,<s%> for they were <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>

<S%G1161>[Now<s%> after He had <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G4404>early<s%> on the <S%G4413>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> He <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> from <S%G3739>whom<s%> He had <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1140>demons.<s%>
She <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G1096>been<s%> with Him, while they were <S%G3996>mourning<s%> and <S%G2799>weeping.<s%>
And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that He was <S%G2198>alive,<s%> and had been <S%G2300>seen<s%> by her, they <S%G569>refused<s%> to <S%G569>believe<s%> it.

And <S%G3326>after<s%> that, He <S%G5319>appeared<s%> in a <S%G2087>different<s%> <S%G3444>form<s%> to <S%G1417>two<s%> of them, while they were <S%G4043>walking<s%> along on their <S%G4198>way<s%> to the <S%G68>country.<s%>
And they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> it to the <S%G3062>others,<s%> but they did not <S%G4100>believe<s%> them <S%G3761>either.<s%>

And <S%G5305>afterward<s%> He <S%G5319>appeared<s%> to the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> as they were <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table;] and He <S%G3679>reproached<s%> them for their <S%G570>unbelief<s%> and <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G4641>heart,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they had not <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G2300>seen<s%> Him after He had <S%G1453>risen.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> into <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> and <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2937>creation.<s%>
"He who has <S%G4100>believed<s%> and has been <S%G907>baptized<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved;<s%> but he who has <S%G569>disbelieved<s%> shall be <S%G2632>condemned.<s%>

"And <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> will <S%G3877>accompany<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G4100>believed:<s%> in My <S%G3686>name<s%> they will <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons,<s%> they will <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1100>tongues;<s%>

they will <S%G142>pick<s%> up <S%G3789>serpents,<s%> and <S%G2579>if<s%> they <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2286>deadly<s%> [poison,] it shall not <S%G984>hurt<s%> them; they will <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on the <S%G732>sick,<s%> and they will <S%G2192>recover.<s%> <S%G2573><s%> "

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> when the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to them, He was <S%G353>received<s%> up into <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> at the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere,<s%> while the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4903>worked<s%> with them, and <S%G950>confirmed<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> by the <S%G4592>signs<s%> that <S%G1872>followed.<s%>] [[And they promptly reported all these instructions to Peter and his companions. And <S%G3326>after<s%> that, Jesus Himself sent out through them from east to west the sacred and imperishable proclamation of eternal salvation.]]
